Public NotInheritable Class RepeaterItemCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class RepeaterItemCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type RepeaterItemCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects in the control. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> objects, which in turn represent the data items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control. To programmatically retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> objects from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, use one of the following methods:
- Use the indexer to get a single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object from the collection using array notation.
- Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection to a <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
- Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
- Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection.Count%2A> property specifies the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection.

> [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> collection. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection.Count%2A> property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.

abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

Docs.summary: Returns a interface that can iterate through all the objects in the .
Docs.returns: A interface that contains all objects in the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> that can be used to iterate through each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection>.
Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move to the next item in the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move the enumerator back to the initial position.
> [!NOTE] > After you create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> object or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method. Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is undefined.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> class and is overridden to always return `false`.
For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> object itself.
For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
